TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and is detained in T type prison in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent .
CARDINAL . NORP The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was arrested by the police on suspicion of membership of a terrorist organisation .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the applicant ’s pre - trial detention .
CARDINAL . On DATE a bill of indictment was filed with ORG accusing the applicant of membership of a terrorist organisation .
CARDINAL . On DATE the first hearing was held before ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG convicted the applicant as charged and sentenced him to DATE and CARDINAL months’ imprisonment . The assize court also ordered the applicant ’s continued detention .
